meta.description: Optimize the factory layout to maximize revenue from producing phones and laptops given space, cost, and labor constraints.

sets.name: PRODUCTS
sets.description: Types of products produced in the factory

params.name: space_cost
params.description: Cost per sq. foot of space for each product

params.name: labor_hours
params.description: Labor hours required per sq. foot for each product

params.name: revenue
params.description: Net revenue per sq. foot for each product

params.name: total_space
params.description: Total available space in sq. feet

vars.name: space_allocated
vars.description: Space allocated in sq. feet for each product

objective.name: max_total_revenue
objective.expr: sum(revenue[p] * space_allocated[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
objective.description: Maximize total revenue from all products

constraints.name: total_space_constraint
constraints.description: Total space allocated must not exceed available space

constraints.name: total_cost_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(space_cost[p] * space_allocated[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total cost for space must not exceed budget

constraints.name: total_labor_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(labor_hours[p] * space_allocated[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total labor hours used must not exceed available labor
